channel.title: strategy on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in strategy on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Content Farm Strategy: AOL’s Master Plan
item.description: Paying peanuts per post is way too common right now, if the posts are not just free. The worst of it is the lack of sustainability of this model that leads to an ever decreasing number of journalists and bloggers, standardization of news, lack of research, reduction of sources and amateurization of the whole writing business.

item.title: Social Business Forecast: 2011 The Year of Integration (Jeremiah Owyang Leweb10 Presentation)
